Bring a recent newspaper to class and read some headlines or articles that are examples of the world’s wickedness. Ask students to read

and make up some headlines that could describe events in Noah’s day. Ask: According to verses 44–45, how did Enoch feel when he saw the events of Noah’s day? What did the Lord show Enoch in verses 46–47 that gave him comfort? How can what Enoch saw be a comfort to us?
